title: (1) Pallet of Coolpaver Santa Barbara Sandstone Mesa/Plaza Pavers
item_description:
1 Pallet of Coolpaver Santa Barbara Sandstone Mesa/Plaza Pavers

Note:Â A mandatory $20.00 per pallet fee will be applied to your invoice. There will be no refunds for returned pallets. No exchanges accepted.

Buyers should arrive prepared with pallet wrapping/shrink wrap, tie downs, tools, V boards, etc. No tie-down assistance will be provided.

  • Photos are representative of the item.
  • Variations in size and color may occur from pallet to pallet.
  • Approximately 3,000 lbs of weight per pallet.

Approximate Coverage:

  • Pallets of block contain approximately 72 pieces per pallet
  • Pallets of pavers contain approximately 100 square feet per pallet
  • Pallets of garden wall contain approximately 126 linear feet per pallet
  • Pallets of Legacy wall contain approximately 24 linear feet per pallet
  • Pallets of Matrix wall contain approximately 68 linear feet per pallet
  • Pallets of Grande contain approximately 122 square feet per pallet
  • Pallets of Legacy Cap contain approximately 84 linear feet per pallet
  • Pallets of Mod Wall contain approximately 144 square feet per pallet
  • Pallets of Keystone Compac contain approximately 48 linear feet per pallet

Approximate Sizes:

  • Giant 10 7/8" x 7 1/8" x 2 1/2"
  • Square 5 1/2" x 5 1/2" x 2 1/2"
  • Rectangle 8 1/4" x 5 1/2" x 2 1/2"
  • Wall 12" x 8" x 4"
  • Legacy Wall 16" x 10" x 6"
  • Stone 8"x16", 16"x16", 16"x24"
  • Grande 16" x 24" x 2"
  • Legacy Cap 16" x 3" x 11"
  • Mod Wall: 4" x 12" x 7"
  • Keystone Compac is 8" x 18" x 12"
